p: Dolotko et al. [ 111] indicated that reaction (21) has a minor contribution to the dehydrogenation reaction, instead, they proposed that LiNH 2 reacts with both LiH and Al: 2LiNH 2 + LiH + Al → Li 3AlN 2 + 5/2 H 2, (22) and the overall reaction was proposed as: LiAlH 4 + LiNH 2 → ½ Li 3AlN 2 + ½ Al + ½ LiH +11/4 H 2 (23)
